dmca.title: URGENT-DEFAMATION
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. Roberts,

Further to our last email to you dated 20/07/08 we have currently
noticed that you have displayed
further defamatory contents on www.aspiesforfreedom.com with regards to
the links below:

http://www.aspiesforfreedom.com/showthread.php?tid=13956&pid=230734#pid2
30734

http://www.aspiesforfreedom.com/showthread.php?tid=13956&pid=230746#pid2
30746

http://www.aspiesforfreedom.com/showthread.php?tid=7780&pid=230636#pid23
0636

http://www.aspiesforfreedom.com/showthread.php?tid=7780&page=8

http://www.aspiesforfreedom.com/showthread.php?tid=13958

http://www.aspiesforfreedom.com/showthread.php?tid=13826

Since you have committed this offence before, we are now going to give
you a final warning
to remove the contents by Thursday 21st August 2008 at 12noon.

Should you fail to remove the contents we will shut your website own
without further notice, in accordance
with our Terms and Conditions of Service.

Kind Regards

UK Legal Department

1&1 Internet Ltd

This electronic message contains information from the 1&1 Internet Ltd.
Legal team which may be privileged or confidential. The information is
intended to be for the use of the individual(s) or entity named above.
If you are not the intended recipient be aware that any disclosure,
copying, distribution or use of this information is prohibited.   If you
have received this e-mail in error please contact the 1&1 Internet Legal
Team via email at

legal@1and1.co.uk.

By the use of e-mail over the Internet 1&1 Internet is not waiving
either confidentiality of, or legal privilege in, the content of the
e-mail and of any attachments.  1&1 Internet Ltd. will communicate with
you by e-mail; however, we cannot guarantee the confidentiality,
reliability or speed of these communications, or of any attached
documents.


1&1 Internet Limited ? Registered at Cardiff, Company number 3953678  -
VAT No GB 752539027

Aquasulis House, 10-14 Bath Road, Slough, Berkshire, SL1 3SA, United
Kingdom
